title: Scott Rao V60 - Single Serve
preparation_steps: Grind 18 grams of coffee to medium-fine consistency.

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour 54g water (3x coffee weight), stir gently.
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Pour 54g water (3x coffee weight) • Stir gently
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir the coffee bed gently to ensure even extraction.

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour to 150g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue with the brewing process. Pour to 150g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl.

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour to 225g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue with the brewing process. Pour to 225g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl. Take your time and focus on technique.

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour to 300g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue with the brewing process. Pour to 300g in 15 seconds, gentle swirl. Take your time and focus on technique. Every step contributes to the final cup quality.

brewing_steps.instruction: Let drain completely.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Let the coffee drain completely at its natural pace.

notes: Focus on maintaining consistent pour rate and minimal agitation.
